## Query.insertOne() method

Inserts a single Document into IndexedDB object store

**Signature:**

```typescript
insertOne(payload: DocumentType, options?: QueryInsertOneOptions): this;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

this


## Example


```ts
const query = new Query(idb, "store-name");
await query.insertOne(document, options);
```
